functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Monster","color":"dark_purple","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"この杖は、触れた者と一体化し、恐ろしい変化をもたらした。","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"text":"伸びた爪、鋭い牙、そして吐かれる業火は、この猛獣を象徴する。","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":false}']},HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:220s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"generic.max_health",Amount:50,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,-1],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:60,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,1],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"generic.armor",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,2],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Amount:-0.8,Operation:2,UUID:[I;0,1,0,3],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,4],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
